snippet.title: Party On Hallow Grove Trailer
snippet.description:
Party on Hallow Grove is a small, cute halloween adventure game where you are tasked with throwing Death the best surprise birthday party EVER!
-
Hey guys, vaaasm here! Thank you so much for tuning in to see the trailer for my first commercial game, Party on Hallow Grove!

This game has been a huge blast to make, and I'm excited to announce that it will be available on steam this October 2024.

Feel free to RSVP for Death's birthday party at: https://www.hallowgrove.vip/rsvp
(Doing so, you will join my mailing list and receive updates, news, and special content!)

Follow me for more stuff!
Tumblr - https://vaaasm.blog/
Mastodon - https://mastodon.social/@vaaasm
Twitter - https://twitter.com/vaaasm

PRESSKIT:
https://press.vaaasm.com/party-on-hallow-grove/
